name: M&M's Kart Racing
overview: M&M's Kart Racing is a video game of the racing genre for the Nintendo DS and Wii video game consoles based on the M&M's license and developed by Frontline Studios. The game allows players to play one of M&M's characters in 12 race environments. It is the first and so far only M&M's racing game. Playable Characters Yellow Red Green Blue Orange
